name: ZERO WASTE PUZZLE
description:
Zerowaste Puzzle

Puzzle Match-3 Meta game is a puzzle game with a setting that allows players to spend more time in the game besides the game itself. Prepare to submit the last project of the 4th year students of Dhurakij Pundit College Faculty of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology Department of Game Design and Development

Game Concept

Our game is based on the concept of Live a Zero Waste life, divided into 3 levels.

It is Level 1 Beginner level. This step is suitable for those who do not know how to start. starting from carrying a cloth bag Avoid using plastic bags Stop using plastic straws Separate garbage correctly Level 2 Intermediate level. Dare to rise up to rejuvenate global warming is to use reusable lunch boxes or boxes instead of styrofoam boxes. Carry a water bottle instead of a plastic cup. Use stainless steel straws, paper straws, wash the plastic before discarding. Level 3 Advanced level. Master level. At this stage, you will begin to understand the term Live a Zero Waste life very well. By this level will start using organic products that do not affect nature. Dispose of trash properly Eat a plant-based diet, don't eat meat.

Of the 3 levels that we've explained, one thing has in common is waste separation, so we'll turn it into a puzzle game. The gameplay is similar to candy crush saga, but it changes the way you play. parts and characters and has added missions for players to do To cultivate and create a foundation for moving towards a Zero Waste lifestyle.

In the game, you play the role of an assistant NPC who collects and sorts each type of garbage.

Game mechanics

1. Some rules or prohibitions on playing

- Players can't sort the trash across types and only have to sort 3 pieces.

- Match 4 pieces to get a broom combo to paint vertically or horizontally.

- Match 5 pieces in a row to get a garbage truck combo. You can choose the type of garbage. If there are 2 adjacent pieces, it can be used to clear the board.

- Arrange 5 pieces out of line, get bombs, can blow up trash or obstacles in the side.

- In 1 game, player will get 1 star.

2. Regulations or parts that limit players

- Players have a cumulative limit of 5 hearts and each heart when used will refresh within 5 minutes/heart.

- In a single game, players can only select up to 3 items in the pre-game mission screen.

- If the mission in 1 game is not passed, the player will lose 1 heart, but if the player passes the mission will not lose heart

- Players must complete cleaning missions in each zone to unlock new zones.

- When players collect all types of garbage or artifacts, they will receive rewards.

3. How to play?

- Players must complete the missions received in each stage. At the end of the game will receive 3 stars / 1 game and need to use the received stars to collect points and receive rewards. In each level, players will receive help items to make it easier to collect stars. If the player has used up all the temps Coins earned by playing can be used to purchase additional items.

Controls

Slide the screen to create combos.
